casebody.data:
Second Department,

February, 1947.

(February 3, 1947.) Fannie Adelman, Appellant, v. City of New York, Respondent.

In an action to recover damages for personal injuries suffered when plaintiff was struck by defendant’s trolley ear, judgment in favor of defendant, entered upon a verdict directed by the court at the close of the case, unanimously affirmed, with costs. No opinion. Present — Lewis, P, J., Hagarty, Adel and Nolan, JJ,; Aldrich, J., deceased.
